root.name: Gold's Gym: Cardio Workout
root.description: IntroductionBears are still a threat!Shape boxing is a game that focusses on self-improvement by doing boxing inspired mini games and exercises. The game features 28 lessons that will help you get or stay fit with nutrition advice and will correct your stance in order to get the most out of your exercise. Even though directly inspired by, Shape boxing offers a more complete experience than the boxing game in Wii Sports. Other than the exercises that focus on actually getting fit there are also quite a number of mini games that offer some more wacky experience like the bear punching mini game.GameplayShape boxing uses two wii motes for one for each hand (preventing you from getting yourself caught up in with the cord that relies the Wii to the nunchuck like it sometimes did in Wii Sports)Â that you swing around like you are actually punching something, balance board support is included although for now it is not known in what manner.
